Text: Thanks for the torrent, but...it is asking for a log-in and password?
Where is the difference between 700 Mb and this 3.93 Gb copy, because in www.ubuntu.com the release is 700 MB.
@makohk :The 700 Mb image on the official page is an installable live CD. This seem to be the "full install" DVD with additional applications and all languages.

Great torrent and great OS! Been using this version since September 2011 and I will be sticking with it until 12.04 LTS!

Fast, free, and secure :)
